author: Alma
text: Confusing ordering process and conflicting shipping information. To date im not sure as to when my order will arrive. Will not order from them again. This was a birthday gift for my son and I had to buy the same sneakers elsewhere as I am not clear as to when they are arriving.
title: Confusing ordering process and…

author: Tina
text: The shoe was kind of dirty on the toe . The shipping was a bit long
title: The shoe was kind of dirty on the toe

author: Kyriah
text: Good variety of shoes but tried to sell me fake ones, thank goodness you’re a good enough company to issue refunds :)
title: Good variety of shoes but tried to sell fakes

author: SK
text: By far the worst company I have ever experienced. Takes forever to get your orders. This is my first and last time using them. Ordered something 2 weeks ago and still haven’t received it. Do yourself a favor and buy your stuff from someone else.
title: By far the worst company I have ever…

author: Soli
text: Delayed another 1 -2 weeks
title: Delayed another 1 -2 weeks

author: Nik
text: Sent me shoes with defects… bruh
title: Sent me shoes with defects… bruh

author: Gus
text: I received my shipment with a Broken box. Shoes dirty and crease.
title: I received my shipment with a Broken…

author: Elin
text: You can’t return if you bought a wrong size, even if you haven’t used them or taken of the tags.
title: You can’t return if you bought a wrong…

author: ReiRei
text: Seller’s pay for shipment now . Better sell elsewhere.
title: Seller’s pay for shipment now

author: SHARY
text: No updates on my order placed almost a month ago!
title: No updates on my order placed almost a…

author: Prachi
text:
After placing an order I did not get a confirmation email or details of tracking the order
I got notifications from dhl though
Lots to improve on the customer experience!!
title: After placing an order I did not get a…

author: Na
text: Shoes have clearly been worn before. This wasn’t disclosed prior to purchasing.
title: Shoes have clearly been worn before

author: Isaiah
text: I would hope I'm receiving this email for a delivered package. Slow delivery for the cost of shipping and no tracking numbers.
title: I would hope I'm receiving this email…

author: Amanda
text: Can we return?
title: Can we return?

author: Larry
text: Still confused as to WHEN I'm gonna get my product that I ordered.
title: Still confused as to WHEN I'm gonna get…

author: Thoroughly Unimpressed
text: No return allowance for sizing discrepancies is crap.
title: No return allowance for sizing…

author: Jan
text:
Initial purchase was left unanswered for abt 1 week upon which money was refunded. There was no communication or whatsoever in the meantime. 

Second purhcase worked rather well - took about 10 days for shoes to arrive.
title: Initial purchase was left unanswered…

author: Sofi
text: Scam!!!!!! They dont deliver they fake it
title: Scam!!!!!!

author: Dr.hixkx
text: This will be week 4 of me having little to no communication from StockX about my bought PlayStation. I had to put in a ticket to get any information from them and the ticket said simply a delay. No action needed. There was no further communication. They didn't tell me how long it would take, why there was a delay or anything and still haven't received anything. I may have to put in another ticket or just request my money back.
title: This will be week 4 of me having little…

author: Paul
text: When you hit the BUY button on a website one assumes you would get the product. Recently I did this and did not receive the shoes after almost after a week and a half of waiting. I was not bidding for a lower price which you can do on this site. I see the shoes are still on the site in my size but now at a higher price. Its all feels sketchy and annoying as a shopping experience.
title: When you hit the BUY button on a…
